dialog: Is that all that must be done, my friend?
That is all there is, indeed.
I am grateful for your assistance in this matter.
If there is anything else you require, simply let me know.
Do you have any further inquiries?
Yes, must I work an entire year before I am able to take a holiday?
Indeed, once you have been here a year, you shall be eligible for a three-day leave.
Only three days, you say?
That is the company policy, I'm afraid.
And what happens if I have exhausted my sick days before the end of the year? Will I lose pay if I am unwell for an extra day or two?
Unfortunately, that is indeed the company policy.
It is the same as the last place where I was employed. I had hoped that things would be different here.
I am famished beyond measure.
Indeed, I too am quite hungry.
Where did you have in mind for us to go for our meal?
I was considering that we should go to the great hall for our repast.
I don't recall ever having dined in the great hall before.
I actually quite enjoy the fare served there.
Does the great hall offer a diverse array of edibles?
They have anything your heart desires, my friend.
